name.jp: ワールドフリフマント(コロンビア)

description.en: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.ar: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.br: Esta capa tem uma representação de corpo inteiro da bandeira da Colômbia.
description.cns: 这件披风上有哥伦比亚国旗的图案。
description.de: Auf diesem Mantel ist die Flagge von Kolumbien in voller Länge abgebildet.
description.fi: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.fil: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.fr: Cette cape est décorée sur sa longueur du drapeau de la Colombie.
description.id: Jubah ini memiliki penggambaran penuh bendera Kolombia di atasnya.
description.it: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.jp: このマントにはコロンビアの国旗が描かれています。
description.kr: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.nl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.pl: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.ru: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.sp: Esta Capa tiene una representación de la bandera de Colombia.
description.sw: This Cloak has a full length depiction of the flag of Colombia on it.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้มีรูปธงชาติโคลอมเบียอยู่เต็มตัว
description.tw: 這件斗篷上有完整的哥倫比亞國旗圖案。
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng này có độ dài đủ mô tả lá cờ của Columbia trên đó.
